headline: Cupid's Arrow Hits Wallets As Valentine's Day Spending Set To Break Records— Candy Is Most Popular, But Jewelry Commands The Dollars
summary: Americans are expected to spend a record $29.1 billion this Valentine's Day, according to the latest survey from the National Retail Federation, with the average shopper shelling out nearly $200 on gifts.

raw.headline: Cupid's Arrow Hits Wallets As Valentine's Day Spending Set To Break Records— Candy Is Most Popular, But Jewelry Commands The Dollars

headline: 1 Large-Cap Stock Worth Your Attention and 2 We Avoid
summary: Large-cap stocks have the power to shape entire industries thanks to their size and widespread influence. With such vast footprints, however, finding new areas for growth is much harder than for smaller, more agile players.
